title: Motorola Razr third-gen foldable leaks with dual camera ahead of rumored Summer release
content:
The crown jewel of the foldable market has generally been devices in the form factor of the Galaxy Z Fold series, but the winner in terms of sales volume has been the traditional flip phone form factor. Motorola previously confirmed a “Motorola Razr 3” foldable was in development, and now a new report is giving us our first look at “Maven.”

more…

The post Motorola Razr third-gen foldable leaks with dual camera ahead of rumored Summer release appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new leak shows our first look at the "Motorola Razr 3" with its refreshed design and dual cameras ahead of a Summer release date.
